title: Beautiful Beachside 3bd/2ba Apt, Central Air, No Fee
neighborhood: Long Beach West End East Atlantic Beach
posting_body: ['To receive a reply, PLEASE read the ENTIRE description to make sure this is a good match, and answer the QUESTIONS on the bottom.', 'AVAILABLE in JULY', 'Rent: $3,950 per month plus electric and gas (heating and cooking) utilities.', 'Enjoy East Atlantic Beach, the lively West End of Long Beach, and the private beach.', 'This is a renovated year-round rental for a 3 bedroom/2 bath UPSTAIRS apartment of a two family house in East Atlantic Beach with THREE parking spots and CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING.', "Beachside and just a few houses from the entrance to the residents' only beach (landlord provides a seasonal entry tag).", 'Amenities include the following: Kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counters, Covered back deck with ceiling fans, Front porch with ocean view, outdoor shower (shared), Laundry room with washer/dryer, folding area (shared).', 'This unit has its own boiler, hot water heater, and central air unit.', 'Conveniently located near everything, including shops, restaurants, and grocery stores.', "First month's rent, one month security deposit and proof of renter's insurance due at lease signing.", 'NO BROKER FEE', 'Good credit (700 or above) and proof of income required.', 'Sorry, no pets.', 'Required To Rent: references from prior landlord, credit report and score thru TransUnion Smart Move (you pay them directly a $40 fee), proof of income, proof of savings, and completed rental application.', 'Please contact by email and we will get back to you.', 'Sorry, please, no pets.', 'If interested, PLEASE reply to this posting with ALL the following info:', '1.', 'What is your full name and phone number?', '2.', 'What is the total number of people who would be living in the house?', '3.', 'When would you like to move in?', '4.', 'How long do you plan to stay?', '5.', 'Do you have any pets or plans to get any?']
